actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to exempt small independent oil producers from the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973.

summary.text: Provides that the authority to specify prices under the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 may not be exercised with respect to the price of crude oil or its derivatives produced by any small independent producer.

titles.title: A bill to exempt small independent oil producers from the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973.
